channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Security (Consumer)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Security (Consumer)

item.title: CVE-2021-36744|2024-08-04T01:01:59.187Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20security%20%28consumer%29
item.description: Trend Micro Security (Consumer) 2021 and 2020 are vulnerable to a directory junction vulnerability which could allow an attacker to exploit the system to escalate privileges and create a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-44023|2024-08-04T04:10:17.277Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20security%20%28consumer%29
item.description: A link following denial-of-service (DoS) vulnerability in the Trend Micro Security (Consumer) 2021 familiy of products could allow an attacker to abuse the PC Health Checkup feature of the product to create symlinks that would allow modification of files which could lead to a denial-of-service.
